Gather.Say: If you are experiencing a medical emergency, please hang up the phone and call 911.
Please press the button corresponding to the type of doctor you would like to request.
If you are facing problems relating to skin, press 1.
If you are facing joint problems, press 2.
If you are facing back problems, press 3.
If you are facing upper respiratory problems, press 4.
If you are facing heart problems, press 5.
If you are dealing with headaches, press 6.
If your problem is related to mental health, press 7.
If your problem is related to diabetes, press 8.
If none of these fit your medical needs, press 9.

Response.Say: Sorry, I didn't get your response.
